content: {A思考星光}If you come across anything, please do let me know~! I need material for my thesis... <style=SizeSmall>I wonder if being hunted down by the thesis deadline counts as a mysterious phenomenon...</style>
info: 日常对话-日常特殊反馈-客机联机-初次见面-1005幻雪_联机对话（CB1）

content: Are you also observing the stars? My frien—{A喜欢}Yeep? A new friend! Hi, I'm <style=NpcName>Frostia</style>.

content: Everything unknown brings such joy, including new friends. Have you... encountered any mysterious phenomena?
